chunks.title: Section 1 - Short title [see Note 1]
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Former Non-Resident Superannuation Funds) Act 1994 > Section 1
chunks.text:
This Act may be cited as the Income Tax (Former Non-resident
         Superannuation Funds) Act 1994.

chunks.title: Section 2 - Commencement [see Note 1]
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Former Non-Resident Superannuation Funds) Act 1994 > Section 2
chunks.text:
This Act commences on the day on which it receives the Royal
         Assent.

chunks.title: Section 3 - Imposition of tax
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Former Non-Resident Superannuation Funds) Act 1994 > Section 3
chunks.text:
Income tax is imposed on the taxable income of an Australian
         superannuation fund within the meaning of the Income Tax Assessment
         Act 1997, to the extent that the taxable income is attributable to
         the inclusion of an amount in the fundâs assessable income under
         table item 3 in section 295-320 of that Act.
Notes to the Income Tax (Former Non-resident Superannuation Funds) Act 1994
Note 1
The Income Tax (Former Non-resident Superannuation Funds) Act 1994 as shown
in this compilation comprises Act No. 172, 1994 amended as indicated in the
Tables below.
For all relevant information pertaining to application, saving or
transitional provisions see Table A.
